Individual entry or exit registers

note.note-paragraph:
This group covers:
- controlling and registering access of persons to restricted areas or devices

Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
- G06K7/00, G06K19/00 arrangements for sensing or reading record carriers
- H03K17/00 electronic switching
- G06K9/00 biometric sensors, recognising biometric patterns
- A61B5/117 biometric identification used for diagnostic purposes
- G06F1/00 access to data processing equipment

reference.text: for electromagnetical or electronical keys and locks, see E05B49/00

reference.text: G07C9/00103 takes precedence

in combination with an identity-check of the pass-holder

reference.text: recognizing patterns, e.g. fingerprints or signatures G06K9/00

CPC-specific-text.text: by means of a pass-word

reference.text: G07F7/00 takes precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: by means of the handwritten signature of the pass-holder
visually, e.g. by comparing in a viewer the written signature with a reference on the pass
electronically, e.g. by comparing signal of hand-writing with a reference signal from the pass
by means of personal physical data, e.g. characteristic facial curves, hand geometry, voice spectrum, fingerprints
